titleStmt.title: Newes from Brest. A diurnal of al that Sir Iohn Norreis hath doone since his last ariuall in Britaine : also of the taking in of the forte by Croyzon, and the names of such captaines gentlemen and others that were slaine and hurte in this seruice. 1594.
titleStmt.author: Norris, John, Sir, 1547?-1597.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Peter Short, for Thomas Millington, and are to be sold at his shoppe vnder S. Peters Church in Cornhill.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: his shoppe vnder S. Peters Church in Cornhill.
